file_content.text: We're in orbit around Voss, Master Satele.
Be wary when you reach the surface. Voss is a strange world under the absolute control of a group of powerful Force users called the Mystics.
The Mystics reject the idea that the Force has both a light and dark side. They claim to follow a "neutral" path, both in their politics and the Force.
Despite their claims, I fear the Mystics have more in common with the Sith than us.
Just tell me what to do.
Are you saying the Voss are servants of the dark side?
What do you mean?
The Mystics use the visions given to them by the Force to control the lives of ordinary citizens. Like the Sith, they use their power to dominate others.
I'll deal with the Mystics the same way I deal with the Sith.
They don't scare me.
The Mystics are prophets who shape the direction of Voss society. The Emperor wants to wipe out all life in the galaxy. Hardly the same thing.
The dark side is subtle and insidious--as you well know. The Emperor did not begin his conquest of the galaxy by declaring his true intentions.
Whatever the Emperor is up to, I'll stop him.
Give me my mission.
I'll be careful while I'm down there, Master.
Thanks for the warning.
A Jedi must be ever vigilant. But the Mystics are not your primary concern.
Just because the Mystics don't follow the Jedi Code doesn't make them evil.
They don't sound that bad.
Don't let the views of your companion corrupt what the order has taught you. A Jedi does not compromise.
In any case, the Mystics are not your primary concern.
We've haven't uncovered the Emperor's plan to destroy Voss yet. But he recently dispatched a Sith Lord named Fulminiss to this system.
Lord Fulminiss created the Harrowers you faced in the Emperor's fortress--be wary.
Give me his location and I'll take care of this.
I'll find a way to stop him.
The Harrowers were twisted beings of pure evil.
He made those abominations?
The dark side has the power to corrupt life itself. Fulminiss is a master at manipulating evolution to create unimagined horrors.
I don't care what kind of creatures he surrounds himself with--when I find him, he's dead!
The Harrowers won't save him.
Your bloodlust is unsettling. You must try to control your emotions, especially when working with the former Emperor's Wrath.
We know Fulminiss is somewhere on Voss. He's communicating with the Emperor through an encrypted communications relay.
We've detected several signal scramblers outside the planet's capital city of Voss-Ka. Disable them and we can track the comm signal to his location.
I won't let you down.
Fulminiss wouldn't just leave those scramblers undefended.
This could be a trap.
I'm too valuable to be sent on a simple sabotage mission.
This is beneath me.
The signal scramblers were hidden deep inside the savage Voss wilderness. Reaching them will be dangerous, even for a Jedi.
If you act quickly, you should be able to disable all the scramblers before Fulminiss knows what's happening--then we can find him.
May the Force be with you.
